pullrequest.title: Add RCPServer and RPCCLient base clients for more organised communication between labscript programs

content.raw:
More things to do:

* Add a `require_client_version()`method to the server that will return an error to the client if its declared versions don’t match its requirements.
* Make the version error messages clearer such that it’s obvious whether the error is about versions on the server or on the client.

‌
content.html:
More things to do:

  • Add a require_client_version()method to the server that will return an error to the client if its declared versions don’t match its requirements.
  • Make the version error messages clearer such that it’s obvious whether the error is about versions on the server or on the client.

‌
